steps.text: Put 100g plain flour, 2 large eggs, 300ml milk, 1 tbsp sunflower or vegetable oil and a pinch of salt into a bowl
Set aside for 30 mins to rest
Set a medium frying pan and carefully wipe it with some oiled kitchen paper
When hot, cook your pancake for 1 min on each side until golden, keeping them warm in a low oven as you go
Serve with lemon edges and caster sugar, or your favourite filling. Once cold, you can layer the pancakes.
